A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I was thoroughly disappointed in the lastest release in the Star Wars universe. The Last Jedi seemed to try too hard and force the humor throughout the movie. I see that they were trying to make it different from the original movies but the force was used transformed from a \"force\" to a ludicrious power that was laughabale at points. I feel like JJ Abrams gave Rian Johnson an excellent story with Snoke and Rey's parents and he botched it.
